name.description: The unique identifier for a config

driver.description: The driver name of golang sql driver lib

host.description: The name of DataBase and port

user.description: The name of account for connect to DataBase

pass.description: The password of account for connect to DataBase

database.description: Default open database. Enabled when use  mysql

tz.description: Set DataBase timzone. It is to use to add the offset for datetime- like column without timezone

max_conn.description: Max Open connections. It is likely the number of max concurrency of sql execute. when 0 then no limit
